subject: Football
lead_paragraph: The two-time Pro Bowl wide receiver Larry Fitzgerald signed a four-year, $40 million contract with Arizona. The deal includes $30 million guaranteed, a generous figure for a franchise that was long considered stingy, and a no-trade clause.
snippet: The two-time Pro Bowl wide receiver Larry Fitzgerald signed a four-year, $40 million contract with Arizona. The deal includes $30 million guaranteed, a generous figure for a franchise that was long considered stingy, and a no-trade clause.
